name: Deep Forest
description:
'''Deep Forest''' is a French music project that originally began as a duo consisting of [[Michel Sanchez (musician)|Michel Sanchez]] and Ã‰ric Mouquet, who created a style of [[world music]], sometimes called [[ethnic electronica]], mixing ethnic with electronic sounds and [[Electronic dance music|dance]] or [[Chill-out music|chillout beats]]. Deep Forest's sound has been described as an "ethno-introspective ambient world music".

The project's [[Deep Forest (Deep Forest album)|self-titled debut album]] was nominated in 1994 for the [[Grammy Award for Best Global Music Album|Best World Music Album Grammy]], and in 1996, they won the same award for ''[[Boheme (album)|Boheme]]''. Deep Forest's albums have sold over ten million copies.{{Citation needed|date=August 2025}} Sanchez left the project in 2005 to focus on a solo career, while Mouquet has continued working under the band's original name. As of 2025, the project has released 13 studio albums as well as a number of live records and several soundtracks and compilations.
